strings.Value: [Attack] "I won't let you go away alive."
"Your Sister has sent me. She's waiting for you in the camp."
"Do you know anything about what happened in Varnhold?"
"Does the word 'Vordakai' mean anything to you?"
{n}The only breathing creature in the ancient tomb is a miniature woman, wrapped in grey cloak. She looks like a ghost herself.{/n}
"I'm one of the Defaced Sisters, a humble servant of benevolent spirits. No words can express my gratitude for saving me!"
"{g|Varnhold}Varnhold{/g}… I don't know much about the place, but ice-cold winds of ill fate blow over it. If my Sisters are still alive, we can tell you more together."

"Same as you — searching for the truth. My fate brought me here and opened the door before me. I didn't know it would slam shut behind my back... If the fate didn't bring you here right after me, I would soon fall asleep beside the owners of this tomb."
"Once cyclopes used to own these lands. But their race was doomed to extinction, their fortresses and palaces crumbled into dust and only tombs remain."
"Thank you. I was afraid I'd never see her again. Let benevolent spirits guide you on your path, let them help you just like you helped me!" {n}The woman gives you a bow and leaves the tomb.{/n}

"Lips of mortals didn't utter this word for thousands of years... It would be for the best if it remained so. Don't worry about this shadow of the past — it dispersed forever the day when sky fell upon earth."
"Maybe such a fate would have been for the best..."
